content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
My classmates are so distinguished. I feel ashamed when I am among them.
I understand how you feel. My classmates are so distinguished, and I am very embarrassed myself at times. I can tell from my conversation that it is making you feel shameful.
Yes I am selected to somewhere I am not up for.
It sounds like you feel put off because of your looks. Is that correct?
